member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementInfoProvider.BulkMoveConsentAgreements(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Moves all consent agreements from the contact identified by given to the contact identified by .
member.remarks: This method should be used only in the merging process. Note that there is no consistency check on whether the contacts with given IDs exist or not (nor is the foreign key check in DB). Caller of this method should perform all the necessary checks prior to the method invocation.
member.param: Identifier of the contact the activities are moved from
Identifier of the contact the activities are moved to

member.summary: Creates an instance of class.
member.param: The DateTimeNowService which will be used for retrieving the current time.

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.Agree(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.DataProtection.ConsentInfo)
member.summary: Inserts an agreement of the given consent and the given contact.
member.remarks: If an active agreement already exists then this active agreement is kept and its hash is updated with a one from the given consent.

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.IsAgreed(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.DataProtection.ConsentInfo)
member.summary: Indicates whether the given contact has agreed the specified consent.
member.returns: Returns true when the given contact agreed the specified consent and is still valid.

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.Revoke(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo,CMS.DataProtection.ConsentInfo)
member.summary: Revokes an agreement of the given consent for the given contact.
member.returns: Returns the agreement object that has been revoked.

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.GetAgreedConsents(CMS.ContactManagement.ContactInfo)
member.summary: Returns agreed consents for the given contact.
member.remarks: Only returns agreed consents, revoked consents are not included.

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.GetContactIDsWhoAgreed(CMS.DataProtection.ConsentInfo)
member.summary: Gets an object query that returns contact IDs who agreed to the specified consent and their agreement is still active (has not been revoked).

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.GetActiveAgreementsQuery(CMS.DataEngine.WhereCondition,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a query that returns only those agreements which have not been revoked.
member.param: Specify the restricting conditions for the query
Name of the column by which the order gets partitioned by.
member.remarks: Note: If you need to restrict the scope of agreements (specific contact, specific consent ...), provide this restriction in the parameter. That way the generated query will use the restriction in the inner select, therefore will provide better performance.

member.name: M:CMS.DataProtection.ConsentAgreementService.GetLastConsentAgreement(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets a last consent agreement that has been created.
member.returns: Returns latest consent agreement object or null when a consent agreement is not found.

member.param: Info object being edited by the form.
member.remarks: When contact is null, ensures contact and maps data to a contact based on mapping configuration of an object.

member.summary: Revokes the given consent for the given contact.
member.param: Info object being edited by the form.
member.remarks: When contact is null, ensures contact and maps data to a contact based on mapping configuration of an object.
